precondition: The Windows XP desktop is displayed.
action: Click an empty area of the desktop background.
expected_results: No immediate visual changes will occur.

precondition: A context menu is open on the Windows desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' dialog box will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Themes' tab is selected.
expected_results: The 'Active Window' preview will change to display the Windows XP default background image. The 'Save As...' and 'Delete' buttons will disappear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled 'Screen Saver'.
expected_results: The screensaver dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available options.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open, and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click anywhere outside of the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
expected_results: A notification window about keeping the computer up-to-date will appear in the bottom left corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" dialog box is open.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box will open.

precondition: The 'Power schemes' dropdown menu is visible in the 'Power Options Properties' dialog box.
action: Click the 'Power schemes' dropdown menu and select 'Home/Office Desk'.
expected_results: The selected power plan will change to 'Home/Office Desk'.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Power Schemes' dropdown menu and select 'Presentation'.
expected_results: The 'Presentation' power scheme will be selected.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will close. A yellow notification balloon titled 'Keep your computer up to date' will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: A yellow pop-up window titled 'Keep your computer up to date' will appear at the bottom of the screen.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog will close.

precondition: The 'Windows Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Windows Display Properties' dialog box will close.
